participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Jake is enthusiastic and loves to share his experiences, especially about his work and family. He enjoys engaging in conversations about food and music.
participant_1.background: my favorite food is mexican food. i'm a construction worker. my favorite band is aerosmith. i've been working since i was sixteen years old.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Sophie is a creative and caring individual who enjoys teaching and helping others. She has a passion for music and a love for exploring new places.
participant_2.background: i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i play several instruments. i'm a piano teacher on the side. my father played violin professionally. i volunteer at the homeless shelter.
